QuestData.Title: Sibling Rivalry
QuestData.Description: Sif? Is it truly you?$b$bNo? A $r? But for a moment....$b$bEnough of this! The visions of my Sif have tormented me for far too long. It is time for me to avenge her, and to bring honor to her memory.$b$bMy brother must pay!
QuestData.LogDescription: Thorim wants you to listen to his story.
QuestData.RewardText: You now know a bit of the history of this land... my land.$b$bI call upon you to assist me in setting these wrongs to right.
